articles.author: David Bressan
articles.title: Oldest Fossils Of Modern Humans Dated To More Than 230,000 Years Ago - Forbes
articles.description: The age of the oldest fossils in eastern Africa widely recognized as representing our species, Homo sapiens, has long been uncertain. Now, dating of a massive volcanic eruption in Ethiopia reveals they are much older than previously thought.
articles.content:
Side view of ancient human skull.
getty
